Name: Running Guys
About the game: Running Guys is a very small running game where a police officer chases a thief. This game was developed in two weeks almost 10 years ago and revived recently (as many children enjoyed it at a science fair). There is only one level (you should give it a chance :P), but we will rework this game in a few weeks to make it with Unreal Engine (mainly to test exports on different platforms). You should definitely grab it now, as it has a low price :P Little tip, when you just hit the ground after a jump or a fall, do a roll!
